response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10,000 to both you and myself. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive offer tailored for someone as discerning as yourself. Don't miss out on this chance to own a product that truly exceeds expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
